channel.title: yudel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from yudel.

item.description: @cstross John Barnes wrote a fun trifle on the American version of this phenomenon in 2012: Raise the Gipper! https://t.co/IuiLnCgV6K

@froomkin might argue that the bothsider instinct of the news denies both the subjects of the stories and their readers of agency — one of the problems noted in the quoted piece. https://t.co/aSsNzp7WH9
Note that the mantra of “vote” effectively denies agency to those of us who always vote. Whereas “make sure all your friends vote” or “here are ways to convince your Republican relatives to sit out the midterms” provide agency — and aren’t on the Democrat’s agenda.
@jaymichaelson The specific view she was punished for was outrage that a DC comic book character was bisexual.
Classified document reveals IDF ‘firing zones’ built to give land to settlers https://t.co/4Mh1VuaS09
@BritishTim @dzkalman She knows her audience.
“‘Fairness’ to the liars but not to the readers” https://t.co/mNjEdRGFkg
@SilvermanJacob Worth highlighting that a well paid Times factotum seems not to know it.
@trekonomics My bacon and frogs-leg eating grandparents would like a word with you.
@KatzOnEarth https://t.co/ORExjxtO2h
The secret is out. https://t.co/rg9sLZcrWn
"Why do people hate conservative Christians?" https://t.co/h5aoxumsDV
It has begun. https://t.co/DmczluKYGK
@RokhlK That’s just mainstream haredi Judaism. Which is contemptible.
@frumfollies @bungarsargon It’s the same game, but I’m close enough to their overlapping worlds that I’m more intrigued by the small differences. #OnceAYeshivaBocher
Raises interesting, non-obvious questions about kitchen safety and kids. https://t.co/zGpkbwxv35

@ariella_kay @AishJewish Remember that for Aish, like John Hagee, Adolph was just doing God’s righteous will. After all, when you believe that you’re just part of a simulation by a righteous God, nothing matters. https://t.co/lop372V24a https://t.co/VM92FevvYZ
@DBashIdeas Baltimore Jewish federation has your number. https://t.co/Rlp7Yc01os
“To determine the coloring of the ancient statues, Brinkmann and Koch-Brinkmann applied both scientific techniques and art historical research.” https://t.co/UwWDTupWwp
@trekonomics To be fair, that’s true of most fields.
And people didn’t believe online relationships were real…. https://t.co/EY8Ta2yIso

“I believe this one wake up call justifies the hundreds of emails I have to delete each and every day.” —My Beloved Conservative Relative, forwarding Bari Weiss’s latest
I guess it’s time for me to go through my hundreds of emails documenting BW’s mendacity.
Again, the fact that the billion dollar Democratic Party operation is yelling at “activists” rather than writing actual talking points refuting BW and the other reactionary grifters is a huge honking problem.

@trekonomics The problem is the demand he’s filling. CEOs who don’t trust themselves or their staff to predict the future.
@trekonomics Ultimately, these are the same people who keep looking to Kissinger for advice. Harari may be facile, but at least he’s not a big time war criminal.
@datadivajf At Barnes & Noble?
@theREALMikeDunn @joshtpm I think he has a legit claim that he has so sabotaged his reputation since April that he can no longer get financing.
